BasicInfo.short: Wiser levels the retail playing field by equipping brands and retailers with data-driven pricing and merchandising solutions.

Products.name: WisePricer
Products.description: WisePricer enables retailers to boost profit margins and revenue, develop a dynamic pricing strategy, and improve merchandising.

Products.name: WiseMapper
Products.description: WiseMapper allows brands and manufacturers to monitor and protect their pricing across the thousands of retailers selling their products.
